file.name: yaba.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0" info: version: 1.0.5 title: BETYdb-YABA description:

The YABA API (BETYdb-YABA) is a Standardized RESTful Web Service API Specification for MetaData Upload to respective tables.

license: name: BSD 3-Clause servers: - url: http://localhost:5001/yaba/v1 # Paths supported by the server application paths: /experiments: post: summary: Upload Experiment Metadata operationId: Meta.insert_experiments tags: - experiments parameters: - in: query name: username schema: type: string description: Username uploading the csv - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: multipart/form-data: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: binary example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for experiment metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- name,start_date,end_date,description 'MAC Season 8: Border','2019-01-01','2019-03-31','ProMix BRK20 14-14-14 Osmocote pots; pre-filled by Hummert Sorghum seed Conviron Growth House' externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=1676963884' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. ERROR - Incorrect credentials of Postgres Database. ERROR - Postgres Database not available. '401': description: Forbidden-No access to user content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - User does not have permission to perform this action ERROR - Invalid query parameter ERROR - Required parameter is missing '410': description: Not Found # Definition of all error statuses default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /sites: post: summary: Upload site or plot metadata to sites table operationId: Meta.insert_sites tags: - sites parameters: - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: application/octet-stream: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: binary shp_file: type: string format: binary dbf_file: type: string format: binary prj_file: type: string format: binary shx_file: type: string format: binary example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for experiment metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- sitename,city,state,country,notes,greenhouse,geometry,time_zone,soil,soilnotes 'MAC Field Scanner Season 8 Range 1 Column 1 W','Maricopa','Arizona','USA','This site represents the the whole wo...',...,'America/Phoenix','soil','soilnotes, externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=347205052' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. ERROR - Incorrect credentials of Postgres Database. ERROR - Postgres Database not available. '401': description: Forbidden-No access to user content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - User does not have permission to perform this action ERROR - Invalid query parameter ERROR - Required parameter is missing '410': description: Not Found # Definition of all error statuses default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /treatments: post: summary: Upload Treatments Metadata operationId: Meta.insert_treatments tags: - treatments parameters: - in: query name: username schema: type: string description: Username uploading the csv - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: multipart/form-data: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: base64 example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for experiment metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- name,definition,control ' MAC Sorghum Season ','Pre-plant Nitrogen fertilizer incorporated in the field',t externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=2041366690' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. ERROR - Incorrect credentials of Postgres Database. ERROR - Postgres Database not available. '401': description: Forbidden-No access to user content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - User does not have permission to perform this action ERROR - Invalid query parameter ERROR - Required parameter is missing '410': description: Not Found # Definition of all error statuses default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /cultivars: post: summary: Upload Cultivars Metadata operationId: Meta.insert_cultivars tags: - cultivars parameters: - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: multipart/form-data: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: base64 example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for cultivars metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- name,ecotype,notes,species 'DP_074','RIL','RIL','Sorghum bicolor' externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=1280032116' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. ERROR - Incorrect credentials of Postgres Database. ERROR - Postgres Database not available. '401': description: Forbidden-No access to user content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - User does not have permission to perform this action ERROR - Invalid query parameter ERROR - Required parameter is missing '410': description: Not Found # Definition of all error statuses default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /citations: post: summary: Upload Citations Metadata operationId: Meta.insert_citations tags: - citations parameters: - in: query name: username schema: type: string description: Username uploading the csv - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: multipart/form-data: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: base64 example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for citations metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- author,year,title,journal,vol,pg,url,pdf,doi "Newcomb, Maria",2019,'Maricopa Agricultural Center Field Measurements and Activities,Journal of Experimental Botany',44,907-920 ,'http://jxb.oxfordjournals.org/cgi/content/abstract/44/5/907?ijkey=c47a46efb0770b07ce74b3affc2bcf364cbba8b7&keytype2=tf_ipsecsha,http://jxb.oxfordjournhls.org/cgi/reprint/44/5/907.pdf,10.1038/nature02403' externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=1613500696' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. ERROR - Incorrect credentials of Postgres Database. ERROR - Postgres Database not available. '401': description: Forbidden-No access to user content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - User does not have permission to perform this action ERROR - Invalid query parameter ERROR - Required parameter is missing '410': description: Not Found # Definition of all error statuses default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /experiments_sites: post: summary: Upload experiment_sites metadata operationId: Meta.insert_experimentSites tags: - experiment_sites parameters: - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: multipart/form-data: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: base64 example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for experiment_sites metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- experiment_name,sitename 'MAC Season 8: Border' ,'MAC Field Scanner Season 5 Range 39 Column 1 E' externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=1613500696' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. ERROR - Incorrect credentials of Postgres Database. ERROR - Postgres Database not available. '401': description: Forbidden-No access to user content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - User does not have permission to perform this action ERROR - Invalid query parameter ERROR - Required parameter is missing '410': description: Not Found # Definition of all error statuses default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /experiments_treatments: post: summary: Upload Experiment_treatments Metadata operationId: Meta.insert_experimentTreatments tags: - experiment_treatments parameters: - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: multipart/form-data: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: base64 example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for experiments_treatments metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- experiment_name,treatment_name 'MAC Season 8: Border','MAC Season 6: Sorghum' externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=1613500696' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. ERROR - Incorrect credentials of Postgres Database. ERROR - Postgres Database not available. '401': description: Forbidden-No access to user content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - User does not have permission to perform this action ERROR - Invalid query parameter ERROR - Required parameter is missing '410': description: Not Found # Definition of all error statuses default: description: Unexpected error content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error" /sites_cultivars: post: summary: Upload sites_cultivars Metadata operationId: Meta.insert_sitesCultivars tags: - sites_cultivars parameters: - in: query name: status schema: type: boolean description: Status for uploading. requestBody: content: multipart/form-data: schema: type: object properties: fileName: type: string format: base64 example: CSV: summary: A CSV file for sites_cultivars metadata Upload.Below is the schema of csv file with example row. text/csv: |- cultivar_name,specie_id,sitename 'Orita','2588','MAC Field Scanner Season 8 Range 1 Column 1 W' externalValue: 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BPkZPfynZI9DB9bRJfa335uC_uNjST5jHVf-XUgSVvM/view#gid=1613500696' responses: '200': description: Successfully Validated '201': description: Successfully Inserted '400': description: Bad Request content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Uploaded file does not meet the standards.Check the columns ERROR - Uploaded file does not have appropriate columns ERROR - File for wrong table is uploaded '409': description: IntegrityError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Constraint Error '500': description: OperationalError content: application/json: schema: type: string example: |- ERROR - Database Connection Error. Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/sites": post: requestBody: contents: application/octet-stream: octet stream with "object" schema not supported
